alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Valley; Northern Valley; Western Roosevelt (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued February 21 at 2:46AM MST until February 21 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Western Roosevelt and Valley Counties. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could produce whiteout conditions. The cold wind chills as low as 35 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Ranchers should take action to protect newborn livestock.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southern Valley; Northern Valley; Western Roosevelt
